title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 31 - Insurance Certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 31 - Insurance Certificate

State Regulations
§ 31.1 - Issuance of certificate of insurance
§ 31.2 - Procedure for issuance
§ 31.3 - Certificate showing additional vehicle or liability coverage
§ 31.4 - Notice of termination

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 31

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 312[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
